SCRIPT.MSCRI:
@echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
cd /d "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#\BIN"
:DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 20 :SET &TMP_INPUT# = C:\input.txt.&$RUNID# :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVERS# = "ALL" Or "all" : SET &ARGS# = ' -g "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#" -u "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" -l servers' : IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER# <> '' : SET &ARGS# = STR_CAT(&ARGS#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#"') : ENDIF srvrlist &ARGS# > "&TMP_INPUT#" for /f "delims=" %%i in (&TMP_INPUT#) do ( echo startup appserver %%i >> "&TMP_INPUT#.tmp" ) move /Y "&TMP_INPUT#.tmp" "&TMP_INPUT#" :ELSE : FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVERS#, ",") : SET &VAR# = 1 : SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ARRAY#[], SIZE)
: WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# echo startup appserver &ARRAY#[&VAR#] >> &TMP_INPUT# : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 : ENDWHILE :ENDIF
:SET &ARGS# = ' /g "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER#" /u "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_USERNAME#" /p "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#" /b /i "&TMP_INPUT#"' :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER# <> '' : SET &ARGS# = STR_CAT(&ARGS#, ' /e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER#"') :ENDIF
srvrmgr &ARGS#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_RETURN_CODE
del &TMP_INPUT#

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*") :PROCESS &HND# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 1)
: SET &POS#=STR_FIND(&output_line#, "Error (") : IF &POS# GT 0 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE = 1 : ENDIF
: SET &POS#=STR_FIND(&output_line#, "SBL-") : IF &POS# GT 0 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE = 1 : ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS
